hadith.text: Narrated Isma'il bin Abi Khalid: From his father that Abu Hurairah informed them that the Prophet (ï·º) said: "When the servant of one of you has endured heat and smoke preparing his food for him, then let him take him by the hand and make him sit him down with him. If he refuses, then let him take a morsel and feed him with it." [Abu 'Eisa said:] This Hadith is Hasan Sahih. Abu Khalid is the father of Isma'il, his name is Sa'd
